name: NOON EDUCATION HOLDING LTD
description: Developer of an e-learning platform designed to prepare students for their examinations digitally. The company's platform offers tutoring and educational content through a subscription model that allows all users free access to basic content and charges them for access to private tutors and more advanced content, enabling students to practice important study material while also allowing learning in a group with friends efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of an e-learning platform designed to prepare students for their examinations digitally. The company's platform offers tutoring and educational content through a subscription model that allows all users free access to basic content and charges them for access to private tutors and more advanced content, enabling students to practice important study material while also allowing learning in a group with friends efficiently.
